page.title: 14THE MAIL IN CROSS & BURNESS
page.content: {QUIVALS' POST OFFICE {Quivals' Post Office}has been open for 3 years. They get{18-20 customers}on an average day. The post of letters & parcels varies according to the day. Tuesdays & Fridays are the busiest in a week because of{Family Allowances}on Tuesdays &{Pensions}on Fridays. { {MAIL DELIVERY} There is only 1 post box in Cross & 1 in Burness. The{local postman,} Mr.Foubister, from Kettletoft delivers letters & parcels to{30 people}on an average day.He does not have anything to do with Quivals' Post Office, but works from a{post bus.}He goes to empty the post boxes at{7.30am.}He spends{3 hours}in Burness delivering post. He usually runs out of post at 2.00pm. His busiest day is a{Tuesday} because the plane is at a later time.
